title: Storm Bulwark in the normal game mode
body:
Janna's shield alone isn't enough to defend a tower, but there is no other option on any other champion or item to defend the tower itself aside from fighting the enemy.  
It would be reasonable, though, to allow the support to give up Exhaust or Flash to have a weakened version of Storm Bulwark in the normal game mode.

I won't suggest something insane like bringing back Fortify, but the Bulwark seems like a great option for defense against multiple-enemy ganks (particularly at bot).

replies.body:
A single turret fortify being on and item like Ohmwrecker would be completely reasonable.

Yes thsi would make Ohmwrecker have both an offencive and defencive active and might make it more considered.
I was considering suggesting it as an addition to Ohmwrecker's, but then it would be too strong in pro play. lol

Just because it's been 6 years since we had any way at all to interact with the stats of our own towers besides Janna's shield. It'd be nice, especially since towers are weaker and all champions are stronger, to have some way to prevent a 4-man gank bot that doesn't rely on two other allies being in position to help. ('cause generally if they are in position to help then the 4-man can't happen in the first place)
